title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions:
Introducing the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover - a versatile and durable solution for your pet's outdoor and indoor needs! This spacious kennel measures 4.2 feet in width, 4.0 feet in length (or depth), and 4.4 feet in height, providing ample room for various animals including dogs, chickens, rabbits, and ducks.

Crafted from high-quality, galvanized metal iron, this kennel boasts a paint-coated finish that not only adds a touch of style but also ensures rust resistance for long-lasting use. Rest assured, the kennel's design includes no sharp edges, prioritizing the safety of your pets.

The kennel comes with a cover made of 210D oxford cloth, a sturdy material that offers multiple benefits. It is windproof, weatherproof, and sunshade, providing optimal protection for your pets against the elements. The cover's waterproof feature ensures your pets stay dry, even during rainy days.

The BingoPaw Playpen is designed with a solid latching swing gate for easy access and strong latches for enhanced security. Its ventilation feature ensures fresh air circulation, keeping your pets comfortable at all times.

Available in both small and large sizes, this kennel is easy to install, thanks to its easy-to-install panels. Whether you're setting it up indoors or outdoors, assembly is a breeze.

Experience the perfect blend of durability, safety, and convenience with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover. Order yours today!
